REQ_CFG_8.content:
**Description:** The web interface SHALL provide capability to save configuration changes to NVS storage and trigger system reset for consistent application.

**Rationale:** Users need to persist configuration changes across reboots. System reset ensures all components see consistent configuration state.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

- AC-1: HTTP POST handler SHALL accept configuration updates as JSON
- AC-2: Handler SHALL validate parameters before applying changes
- AC-3: Handler SHALL save valid configuration to NVS
- AC-4: Handler SHALL return success/error status with descriptive message
- AC-5: System SHALL reset within 2 seconds after successful NVS save
- AC-6: All configuration changes SHALL take effect only after system reset
REQ_CFG_8.title: Configuration Save Operation
